3DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIORorrico of Indian AstairsHospital.Total58294558DAILY HOSPITAL PATIENT RECORDFicoal Year 193 4-36Northorn NavajoNorthern Nava 1o Sub- Dive AgencyDayJul Aug Aug 803 Oct Nov DOO Jan Dob Mar Apr Lloy Jun461 33 255915753 1.8 164 15631542 1952296030485356 5959 63 3450 516460355 632719334851 5831460645730203154634356631205048 60 695160576161651616663| 6732 4925 234756760546260 6534| 462749505228862314362366434 4968934 1 4932604055616066 32106233 545153 6163 1632752395435 5331 3966 58 5754 59526012556730 38 36| 5557556150516233 1844265135149556154625833 635952485227535461535916536434 4633 4824525940521652586756 45503619634117585660536684 1442.2241 52185145| 57555622 3755 7069541960374844 5222535855725564622071575054696145 4924 355721 6351715332 3857626342 55624356226557307464405748546758442323675542534864525624426023 42555855 5948 58522555 6856 5949555558 5725 354226 2252365861545362 57 6168gg65 57552746625934545728455853506030235766 47295)3326 472 5852665753SO46 5267 55326853| 5224314531506552246068358288758760060158560159861162261760660158560061763662063465065062961961462462659953225543276169656369671958535358Total821 1056 1186 1622 1833 1796 1769 1623 1773 1906 1541 1570 18502DailyAves. 26.5 34.1 39.5 52.4 59.5 5850.757.1 57.1 57.2 63.6/ 49.8 52.4|This record is for computing daily avoragos for monthly and yoarly reports.Patient count to be taken as of midnight. Patisats admittod as hospital patients and discharged the same day for any reason should be counted as though inbed at midnight as such patients must be inoluded in count of hospital days.Use aotal number of days in month or yoar as divisor in computing daily avorIf remainder is one half or over, raiso quotiont. For example 5.56: 5.6.The sum of the down totals and the sum of the aorosa totals must equal.Attach copy of this record to pages of hospital statistics in annual statistical report.( Pages 23, 24, and 25 for 1934.)
